thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 15 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Mensch Und Maschine Software: ‍FY EBITDA Up At EUR 18.0 Mln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Mensch Und Maschine Software: ‍FY EBITDA Up At EUR 18.0 Mln
text:
Feb 15 (Reuters) - MENSCH UND MASCHINE SOFTWARE SE :
* Q4 SALES ROSE TO APPROX. EUR 45.0 MILLION (PY: 39.48 / +14%)
* FY NET PROFIT AFTER MINORITY SHARES SOARED TO APPROX. EUR 8.5 MILLION (PY: 6.59 / +29%)
* ‍FY EBITDA UP AT EUR 18.0 MILLION (PY: 15.76 / +14%)​ * MENSCH UND MASCHINE SOFTWARE - IT IS MOST LIKELY THAT WE CAN PROPOSE A 50 CENTS DIVIDEND AFTER 35 CENTS IN PREVIOUS YEAR - CEO Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
